participant_1.name: Joyce
participant_1.personality: Joyce is friendly and outgoing, always eager to meet new people and share her interests.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is the who. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i have never been out of ohio. i work for our local supermarket. i've a cat named spook.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is thoughtful and introspective, with a passion for learning and exploring new ideas.
participant_2.background: my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.
